string-array.name: def
string-array.item: Used as a greeting or to begin a phone conversation.
A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, providing a level surface for eating, writing, or working at.
A separate seat for one person, typically with a back and four legs.
A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers.
A piece of furniture for sleep or rest, typically a framework with a mattress.
A thing intended; an aim or plan.
Consent to receive or undertake (something offered).
Strike (a person or an animal) repeatedly and violently so as to hurt or injure them, typically with an implement such as a club or whip.
